Articles.Content:
Introducing Snowtiger's second spacecraft posted on the Spacecraft Exchange forum.

The Mirage Supersonic Fighter Jet can reach speeds up to 329m/s while cruising.

It is very easy to control and can do some nice maneuvers like a loop-de-loop and barrel rolls.

Essentially the same as the Hydra Supersonic Fighter Jet but with different aesthetics.

It is not an SSTO.

\*while taking off be careful because the tail fins can break off if you try to take off too fast\*

**Features:**

2 Standard Jet Engines with precoolers and nacelles

2 Circular Intakes

2 Airbrakes

2 Headlights

Tacos in the Glovebox
